document_data.caption: Tharden and his brothers discover Wave Echo Cave.
document_data.name: Tharden Rockseeker
document_data.mainbody: '''Tharden Rockseeker''' was a [[dwarf]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. He was one of the three [[dwarf]] brothers who rediscovered [[Wave Echo Cave]].
document_data.Possessions: Rockseeker owned a pair of ''[[boots of striding and springing]]''.
document_data.History:
Tharden was one of three Rockseeker brothers attempting to re-open the lost mine near [[Phandalin]].

This dwarf was slain by forces under the command of [[Nezznar]] in [[1491 DR]].{{Phandelver-time}}
document_data.Relations: He was the eldest brother of the Rockseeker Trio, being older than [[Nundro Rockseeker]] and [[Gundren Rockseeker]].
